about_the_game:
This expansion pack comes with a new 3v3 arena battle mode. Team up with two other players and participate in a series of fierce elimination matches for a chance to win rare equipment and items. You may also enter the Spectator Mode and place small bets on the battle outcomes to win big money.

The expansion pack will also introduce new heroes, gears, and items that you can use in the base game, offering greater variety to build possibilities:

- Experience the wonderful hero combos with 3 new gameplay mechanics around the competitive - tournament gameplay;
- 5 new recruitable NPC’s, each with their own unique mechanics and new visuals;
- Dominate the arena with 25+ new design/item and reap the rewards;
